text: The Boeing E-3 Sentry is a military aircraft. It is used as AWACS by US Air Force, NATO and three foreign operators: France, Saudi Arabia, and the UK. It is a military variant of the famous Boeing 707 airliner. This kind of aircraft was used in the Gulf War, as well as in the War in Afghanistan. E-3 Sentry Category:United States Air Force aircraft
title: Boeing E-3 Sentry
